description:
The physics department of Soochow Univ. invites applications for the 1000-plan young researcher program.
The Soochow Univ. at Suzhou is a fast developing university in recent years. Now more than 50 young researchers of 1000 plan successfully joined Soochow University. The physics department is now a member of the BESIII Collaboration and closely collaborate with the Institute of High Energy Physics(CAS, Beijing). We welcome both experimental and theoretical Chinese young researchers to join Soochow University.
position: Recruiting Chinese Young Researchers for Particle Physics at Soochow Univ
